item.title: AppSec Open Source I Have Come Across
item.description: Tools Brakeman Scanner: Able to detect vulnerabilities on the latest Ruby on Rails version. https://brakemanscanner.org OWASP Dependency-Check: Able to detect vulnerabilities in project’s depedencies. https://dependencytrack.org
